review_data.title: Indian Palace Zurich
review_data.content: One of the best places I have visited abroad for genuine & delicious Indian cuisine and warm hospitality,would definitely recommend a visit if you are in Zurich.

review_data.title: delicious Food
review_data.content: Today we had the best time at dinner. Truly a great place to eat the best indian food in the city.I reccomend the Best veg & Non veg.They have very positive and knowledgable service. Great atmosphere cheers ☆☆☆☆☆

review_data.title: Amazing

review_data.title: Good food, great hospitality
review_data.content: Had multiple meals at this restaurant and each meal was awesome Staff and owner both are caring I am surprised by negative reviews Anyway Roti, curd are too good in taste Perfect India food taste

review_data.title: Good Indian Lunch
review_data.content: We went to this restaurant for lunch. They serve all varieties of North Indian food both veg and non veg. The food was very tasty and the service was very good. The staff were very courteous.

review_data.title: Too small but decent food

review_data.title: Excellent Hospitality n Food
review_data.content: Nice to see Indian hospitality in true sense with excellent food,ambience,service n behaviour. Owner n staff of restaurant on their toes to serve the group.Very nicely cooked tasty food with lots of care n attention. True Indian spirit from a lady from Kurukshetra Haryana.

review_data.title: Nice Indian Food
review_data.content: We had dinner there, during our stay at Zurich. Both ambiance and food were good.One can enjoy original indian taste.Enjoyed the food.Seating accommodation is enough.

review_data.title: Good Ambiance and Food

review_data.title: Good Food - Reasonable Pricing

review_data.title: Decent Indian food

review_data.title: Dinner / Abendessen

review_data.title: Take Away
review_data.content: Third time we ordered for takeout. Only this time, aside from the mixup in our order, the regular cook probably had his day-off 😔

review_data.title: Homely Food
review_data.content: We enjoyed our 2 buffet dinners in September 2015 during our 3 nights in Zurich in a group tour. Nice ambiance ,quick service,excellent behavior,tasty dishes,crisp nans & bread.

review_data.title: Good Restaurant
review_data.content: It is near Oerlikon station. food is decent , not great, but you should expect this in Europe. Not too spicy.

review_data.title: Needs lots of improvement

review_data.title: A simple Indian restaurant serving Vegetarian food

review_data.title: Nice restaurent
review_data.content: Nice restaurent near Swisotel hotel zurich orlikon.We had visited .Food is good.Persons were polite Made chilly nan even not in menu.Gave side dishes which is never given in paris or switzerland.Also with each vegetable rice was given so good for value.Will recommand.

review_data.title: Not value for money

review_data.title: Best Indian in Zurich
review_data.content: We live and Zurich and have been going to Indian Palace for years. Every visit is great and the quality and taste are always amazing. It is great for groups especially to share and try different items.

review_data.title: Good Indian food
review_data.content: Lassi with naan and curry. Decent taste (especially if you have travelled from India!). The hotel had "OK" ambience.

review_data.title: Average Indian Restaurant in Zurich

review_data.title: Delicious!
review_data.content: This restaurant has become our favourite Indian restaurant in Zurich. The food is delicious and the staff very friendly. We are looking forward to our next visit!

review_data.title: Ausgezeichnet

review_data.title: Nice desi experience

review_data.title: Good Food But A Little Too Much Family Atmoshere.

review_data.title: Authentic indian food
